noteR.para: Before repairing the sealing, check the sealing of the zone concerned vehicle : sealing checkGIEMR-002440.

procedure.title: PREPARATION OPERATION FOR REPAIRING THE SEALING
CHECK THE POSITION AND ADJUST IF NECESSARY:

ul.li: the scuttle panel grille scuttle panel grille : removal - refittingGIEMR-001380,
the scoop under the scuttle panel grille deflector under scuttle panel grille : removal - refittingGIEMR-000837,
the front side opening element seal,
the blanking covers and grommets of the bulkhead.

noteR.para: If the seals are dirty, clean them in soapy water vehicle sealing : general informationGIEMR-002468.

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.
YES: check the sealing of the zone vehicle front section : sealing checkGIEMR-002304.

procstep.para: Was water present in the passenger compartment of the vehicle?

ul.li: YES: move on to the next step.
NO: fault resolved.

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the front opening element sealing has been checked?

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.
YES:
a) if the front opening element seal is deformed, replace the front opening element seal,
b) if the front opening element seal shows signs of wear, cuts or cracks, replace the front opening element seal.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the front opening element seal vehicle front section : sealing checkGIEMR-002304.

procedure.title: SCUTTLE PANEL GRILLE AND SCOOP UNDER THE SCUTTLE PANEL GRILLE

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the sealing of the scuttle panel grille and scoop under the scuttle panel grille has been checked?

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.
YES:
a) if the scuttle panel grille is deformed, cracked or split, replace the scuttle panel grille,
b) if the clips of the scuttle panel grille are deformed or broken, replace the scuttle panel grille clips.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the scuttle panel grille vehicle front section : sealing checkGIEMR-002304.

ul.li: c) if the scoop under the scuttle panel grille is deformed, cracked or split, replace the scoop under the scuttle panel grille,
d) if the sealing foam of the scoop under the scuttle panel grille is detached, cut or compressed, replace the foam of the scoop under the scuttle panel grille.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the scoop under the scuttle panel grille vehicle front section : sealing checkGIEMR-002304.

procedure.title: MASTIC FILLING OF THE BULKHEAD / SCUTTLE SIDE PANEL, BULKHEAD / BULKHEAD LOWER CROSS MEMBER, BULKHEAD / WINDSCREEN APERTURE LOWER CROSS MEMBER CLOSURE PANEL

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the sealing of the mastic filling of the bulkhead / scuttle side panel, bulkhead / lower cross member of bulkhead, bulkhead / windscreen aperture lower cross member closure panel has been checked?

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.
YES:

a) if the mastic is faulty or incorrectly positioned on the panelwork connections, apply extruded mastic to the panelwork connections after assembly anti-corrosion protection : descriptionGIEMR-001837 and bodywork sealing product : descriptionGIEMR-001821.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the mastic filling of the bulkhead / scuttle side panel, bulkhead / bulkhead lower cross member, bulkhead / windscreen aperture lower cross member closure panel vehicle front section : sealing checkGIEMR-002304.

procedure.title: BLANKING COVERS AND GROMMETS OF THE BULKHEAD

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the sealing of the blanking covers and grommets of the bulkhead has been checked?

ul.li: NO: fault resolved.
YES:
a) if the blanking covers and grommets of the bulkhead are detached, refit the blanking covers and grommets of the bulkhead.
b) if the blanking covers and grommets of the bulkhead are deformed or cracked, replace the blanking covers and grommets of the bulkhead.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the blanking covers and grommets of the bulkhead vehicle front section : sealing checkGIEMR-002304.
